original_title: Hypnotizing Power: The Story of Master of Puppets
overview: Feature documentary chronicling the making of Metallica's third studio album 'Master of Puppets'.  Comprised from a wealth of archive interviews, studio and demo recordings, live performances and stock footage, the documentary is told exclusively in the words of the band members and those that helped make the album.
title: Hypnotizing Power: The Story of Master of Puppets
